availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Adam D. Caplinger (Carroll Co, KY, blacksmith and postmaster)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Adaline Teague Caplinger in Trimble County on August 21, 1845. Father of James F. Caplinger, Elizabeth F. Caplinger, Nancy E. Caplinger, and Isadore M. Caplinger. Married to Eliza Ellen Sandifer Caplinger in Carroll County on October 2, 1856. Father William K. Caplinger. Appointed postmaster in Sandifer's Store, Carroll County, Kentucky in 1856. Blacksmith in Carroll County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Mill Creek, District 1, p. 137.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trimble County Marriages, Film #000420389.
